title: When Renault ruled F1
summary: I remember an early 1978 argument over the chassis of the RS10 and the use of the engine,” said Renault Formula 1 team driver Jean-Pierre Jabouille. “Whether to put a twin…

qa_pairs.question: Which car was the first Formula 1 car to use a turbocharged engine?
